abstract: Leonard Manzo, 90, dies in fire in his Queens apartment.
lead_paragraph: The victim, Leonard Manzo, was found unconscious in Howard Beach by emergency workers who were responding to a call there.

headline.main: Man, 90, Dies in Queens Apartment Fire
headline.print_headline: Man, 90, Dies in an Apartment Fire

snippet: The victim, Leonard Manzo, was found unconscious in Howard Beach by emergency workers who were responding to a call there.
